title: Where do I go/put it? (That's what she said.)
body:
The name of this discussion has no relevance to anything I'm about to type btw.   xD
But anyways, I have a champion concept design that i would like a Riot member to take a look at(not much, no art or anything fancy), i have a stats spread sheet, and a general concept for what she would do. But, the problem is that I don't know how to submit, said concept design. So, any  help please? And if a RIOT employee finds this, that's even better. :)

replies.body:
The best place to post up a Champion concept design is on the [Concept & Creations boards.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts) This is where it will see the most visibility by both members of the community offering feedback, along with potentially a member of the Champion Creation Team. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
